import React, { Component } from "react"; import Header from "./Header.js" import "../css/style.css" import data from '../data.json' class Webapp extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { feelings: [], boosts: [], activities: [], feeling: "", boost: "", activity: "", } } componentWillMount() { this.setState({ feelings: data.feelings, boosts: data.boosts, activities: data.activities, }) } setActivity(name) { this.setState({ activity: name }) } render() { const feelings = this.state.feelings.map((item, key) =>
); /* how to create better badges: https://codepen.io/waltir/pen/rOmvBR */ const activity = this.state.activities.map((item, key) => ); return (
